```{r setup}
#| include: false
library(tidyverse)
source(here::here("R/functions.R"))
lipidomics <- read_csv(here::here("data/lipidomics.csv"))
```

## Basic statistics (Table 1)

```{r}
lipidomics %>%
  group_by(metabolite) %>%
  summarise(across(
    value,
    list(
      mean = mean,
      sd = sd
    )
  )) %>%
  mutate(across(
    where(is.numeric),
    ~ round(.x, digits = 1)
  ))
```
